org.apache.derbyTesting.unitTests.harness

Interface UnitTestManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicUnitTestManager

    public interface UnitTestManager
    The UnitTestManager provides a mechanism for registering subsystem tests and then invoking them. It can produce an output report specifying the results, the timing, and any output produced by the tests. If the run fails, the invoker of the tests should shut down the system.

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String RUN_FOREVER

    • Field Detail

      • MODULE

        static final java.lang.String MODULE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RUN_FOREVER

        static final java.lang.String RUN_FOREVER
        Debug flag to allow the cloudscape system running the tests to run forever. By default test systems are killed after an interval of T_Bomb.DEFAULT_BOMB_DELAY to avoid tests hanging.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SKIP_UNIT_TESTS

        static final java.lang.String SKIP_UNIT_TESTS
        Debug flag to skip unit tests.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • registerTest

        void registerTest(UnitTest objectToTest,
                  java.lang.String testName)
        register an object that has the UnitTest interface, marking what type it has and its duration. Tests are run in the order they were registered.

      • runTests

        boolean runTests()
        run the tests. Tests are run in the order they were registered, filtered by type and duration set for the unit test manager.

      • runTests

        boolean runTests(int testType,
                 int testDuration)
        Convenience function to set the test type and duration for the UnitTestManager and then run the tests.

        See Also:
        UnitTestConstants

      • setTestDuration

        void setTestDuration(int testDuration)
        the test duration is set. This will be used when the tests are run; no tests with duration more than specified will be run.

      • setTestType

        void setTestType(int testType)
        the test duration is set. This will be used when the tests are run; no tests with duration more than specified will be run.

      • setPerformanceReportOn

        void setPerformanceReportOn(boolean performanceReportOn)
        specify whether performance statistics should be gathered when tests are run. The manager will collect the duration of each test, and will compare it to any previous runs it may have done of that test.
